    Helper for consuming expected messages from Kafka in integration tests

    Runs an in-memory, "embedded" Kafka cluster with 1 ZooKeeper instance and 1 Kafka broker.

    Tests that a type is immutable.

    Test utility class for ensuring unique identifier names in KSQL statements.

    A Utility class to consolidate where we allocate state folders for tests.

    Add some missing map matchers.
    TestBasicJaasConfig
    Junit test resource that sets the Jaas config for the JVM

    TestMethods
    Find methods within a class on which to run tests.
